title: Shaman King (2021): Funbari Onsen Hanjouki
content:
You often see enclosing shows trying desperately to hang on to their fans after the story wraps up, perhaps to buy as much time and stay relevant for as long as possible in other to keep up the sales, often you see this materialize as cheaply made Picture Dramas, and oh man, I have watched a dozen or so to say that they suck like a stumpy toe.

This, however, was kinda cute to watch, for starter, they art style carries some weight, it feels like one of those expensive graphic novels, very Chibi but it screams of quality, the voice acting is cute and thedialog is somewhat funny, I definitely see the appeal, especially compared to those awful Code Geass Picture Dramas.
